TopicTitle: Can I make ModuleProbeControlPoint require KSC connection instead of Pilots

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to make a way to make "relay satellites" for stock CommNet need a long range direct antenna for connection to KSC, with shorter range relay antennas to pick up closer signals to relay via its long range direct. So for example a Jool relay sat would need a 88-88 to talk to KSC, and then an RA-2 to cover the Joolian system.

One way I thought I could do this was with ModuleProbeControlPoint, with minimumCrew = 0, but that just enables control even if the main relay sat has no connection to KSC. Is there a way to enable that module after checking VesselControlState , just in a part cfg file? (I haven't done any dll modding...)
